fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Perform the factional Mafia kill each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you perform the factional Mafia kill, you may choose to ambush one of your target's visitors instead of attacking your original target.

- If no one visits your target when you choose to ambush, you will attack your target normally. This will still waste an ambush charge.

- You may only ambush three times.

- You cannot ambush two nights in a row.

- If you are controlled while ambushing, you will instead normally attack the target you are controlled into. This will not waste an ambush charge.

- You cannot ambush other Mafia members if they visit your target.
